overview: The „Place“ is a documentary that’s trying to explore hidden city locations that have interesting stories and visuals. VR would be a great tool to use because viewers could instantly experience that space. Research is going to take place through several different people from different backgrounds. There would be young people as well as old. An important role is also going to have a tourist guide, who is going to be asked to take us to someplace that they don’t usually take tourists to.
title: Place
